name: Marselo: The Game
storyline: They are the best of friends but Kino starts to harass, Kino falls thinks Panxo "too good"of a friend... troubles happen, Niko and Panxo begin to run around with Howl and Gallo and Kino tries to commit suicide on the hill (they stop him by telling him that now If they would take it into account) Kino goes with his grandmother on vacation one summer and decides to return earlier and stop reserving those feelings and goes on a motorcycle to Santiago
summary: Marselo: The Game is a platformer based on killing enemies and getting into each level by getting the key to the next house
